column4: can some one help me please im a noob to ubuntu i found a realtek audio linux driver and download it i just dont know how to install it can some please help me
what type of file is it
what type of file did you donwload?
open a terminal and type cd <path to folder>
just copy the directory from the title bar in your filemanager
ok open a new terminal and type cd Desktop
now type cd real then hit tab
type cd real and before you hit enter hit tab then enter
ok just type cd then drag and drop the unzipped folder onto the terminal
are you in the unzipped folder?
type cd into the terminal and dont press enter
now drag and drop the folder you unzipped onto the terminal
right click that file and click "Extract Here"
